issue.title: Let shlibs handle dependencies for binary packages in debian/control

content.raw:
This is done by default, nothing should be done for that. Please see my pull request and in particular commit https://bitbucket.org/thomas_moulard/gazebo-release/commits/ce883c71cf4523f06bdda53523dcfdeb8e4b4240/

This modification can be picked manually before splitting Gazebo in several packages.
